sentence.Network_en: Note the low hemoglobin ( HGB ). Microcytosis is indicated by the low MCV ( corpuscular volume ).
sentence.Network_cn: 可见血红蛋白 ( HGB ) 减少, MCV ( 红细胞平均体积 ) 减少提示小细胞低色素性贫血.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 小红细胞症(Microcytosis) + 红细胞异型(Poikilocytosis) + 靶形红细胞(Target Cells) + 与地中海贫血对照(Consistent with Thalassemia minor)  检测结果呈阳性.

means.word_mean: 1. a blood disorder characterized by the presence of microcytes (abnormally small red blood cells) in the blood; often associated with anemia
